*div1 type="summary"* *p*W. C. Whitaker to Austin, Clinton, Miss,, July 25, 1832. Asking about political conditions in Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Clinton*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="07-25-1832">July 25th. 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr Sir I have not written to you on my return *location_mentioned*home */location_mentioned*according to my promise when in your *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*. I had for some time declined the Idea of visiting your *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*again, owing to misfortune in my *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*etc. At present however I have become satisfied to come to Your *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*in the *date_mentioned n="Fall-1832">fall*/date_mentioned*, provided I can hear from you, and understand the state of affairs, I see an account in one of your last *location_mentioned*papers*/location_mentioned*, of a meeting of the *person_mentioned*Inhabitants */person_mentioned*of your *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*and resolutions past etc also I see an account of *person_mentioned*Bradburn*/person_mentioned*s defeat at *location_mentioned*Anhuac */location_mentioned*by *person_mentioned*Capt Adams*/person_mentioned* and also of the defeat of *location_mentioned*Velasco */location_mentioned*Commanded by *person_mentioned*Capt John Austin*/person_mentioned* on the *date_mentioned n="06-27-1832">27th June*/date_mentioned*, since which time I have become quite anxious to hear the true and correct statement of the state of the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*at present, Therefore Col I wish you to write me respecting the same and give me your opinion with regard to what I could do there at present, and what I will have to depend on when I come if I do, I shall come to remain in the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*, to make it my home perhaps for life—*/p*
*p*I should be very happy to be there, in defence of your *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*and there is numbers in my *location_mentioned*Parish */location_mentioned*who would go at any time, where there should be and inducement held out to them worthy of their attention—we are all anxiously awaiting to hear of *person_mentioned*Santa Anna*/person_mentioned* proveing Victorious and your *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*open for *person_mentioned*emigrants*/person_mentioned*, and to see your *location_mentioned*Colny */location_mentioned*at peace and a Flourishing write me upon the reception of this, and you shall either hear from me amediately, or see me personally and accompanied by as many as you would wish If directed by you so to do—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*W. C. Whitaker */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
